languages.text: "Не считаю нужным что-либо добавлять. Я действовал в пределах своих полномочий, руководствуясь исключительно соображениями блага вашего протектората и вашей личной безопасностью. Если вы желаете провести проверку — я не возражаю".

"I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your protectorate and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."
languages.original_text: "Не считаю нужным что-либо добавлять. Я действовал в пределах своих полномочий, руководствуясь исключительно соображениями блага вашего протектората и вашей личной безопасностью. Если вы желаете провести проверку — я не возражаю".

traits.locale_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your trade empire and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your trade empire and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your trade empire and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your protectorate and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我认为没必要补充什么。我在我的权限范围内行事，这一切都是为了确保您的王朝的最大利益与您的个人安全。如果您想亲自确认我的行动是否正确，我并不反对。”
languages.original_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your protectorate and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."

traits.locale_text: “我认为没必要补充什么。我在我的权限范围内行事，这一切都是为了确保您的王朝的最大利益与您的个人安全。如果您想亲自确认我的行动是否正确，我并不反对。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No tengo nada que añadir. Actué dentro de los límites de mi autoridad, guiándome solo por los intereses de su protectorado y de su seguridad personal. Si quiere confirmar la rectitud de mis acciones, no me opongo».
languages.original_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your protectorate and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo nada que añadir. Actué dentro de los límites de mi autoridad, guiándome solo por los intereses de su protectorado y de su seguridad personal. Si quiere confirmar la rectitud de mis acciones, no me opongo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「何も付け加える必要はありません。私は自分の権限の範囲内で、あなたの保護領の最善の利益とあなたの身の安全だけを考えて行動しました。私の行動の正当性をご自身で確認されたいのであれば、異存はありません」
languages.original_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your protectorate and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."

traits.locale_text: 「何も付け加える必要はありません。私は自分の権限の範囲内で、あなたの保護領の最善の利益とあなたの身の安全だけを考えて行動しました。私の行動の正当性をご自身で確認されたいのであれば、異存はありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich sehe keine Notwendigkeit, etwas zu ergänzen. Ich habe im Rahmen meiner Befugnisse gehandelt, geleitet allein von der Sorge um Euer Protektorat und Eure persönliche Sicherheit. Wenn Ihr die Korrektheit meines Handelns selbst überprüfen möchtet, habe ich keinerlei Einwände."
languages.original_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your protectorate and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe keine Notwendigkeit, etwas zu ergänzen. Ich habe im Rahmen meiner Befugnisse gehandelt, geleitet allein von der Sorge um Euer Protektorat und Eure persönliche Sicherheit. Wenn Ihr die Korrektheit meines Handelns selbst überprüfen möchtet, habe ich keinerlei Einwände."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vois rien d'autre à ajouter. J'ai agi dans le cadre strict des pouvoirs qui me sont conférés, et ce, dans le seul but d'asseoir votre autorité et de garantir votre sécurité. Si vous souhaitez vous assurer par vous-même de la pertinence de ma démarche, je n'y vois pas la moindre objection. »
languages.original_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your protectorate and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vois rien d'autre à ajouter. J'ai agi dans le cadre strict des pouvoirs qui me sont conférés, et ce, dans le seul but d'asseoir votre autorité et de garantir votre sécurité. Si vous souhaitez vous assurer par vous-même de la pertinence de ma démarche, je n'y vois pas la moindre objection. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ekleme yapmaya gerek görmüyorum. Yetkim dâhilinde, sizin ve protektoranızın güvenliğini sağlamak amacıyla hareket ettim. Yaptıklarımın doğruluğunu bizzat tartmak isterseniz itiraz etmem."
languages.original_text: "I see no need to add anything. I acted within the remit of my authority, guided exclusively by the best interests of your protectorate and your personal safety. If you wish to confirm the rectitude of my actions for yourself, I have no objections."

traits.locale_text: "Ekleme yapmaya gerek görmüyorum. Yetkim dâhilinde, sizin ve protektoranızın güvenliğini sağlamak amacıyla hareket ettim. Yaptıklarımın doğruluğunu bizzat tartmak isterseniz itiraz etmem."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
